docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
PangaShift Solutions is a healthcare staff scheduling platform designed to optimize workforce management, improve efficiency, and streamline communication.

For detailed usage instructions, refer to the sections above.

docs.title: About
docs.text:
PangaShift Solutions provides an innovative staff scheduling system tailored for healthcare facilities. Our platform enables:

  • Automated shift scheduling to reduce manual effort.
  • Compliance with labor laws through built-in regulatory checks.
  • Real-time notifications for schedule updates and shift swaps.
  • Seamless integration with HR, payroll, and EMR systems.
  • Mobile access for employees to manage their schedules on the go.

Our mission is to enhance operational efficiency in healthcare staffing, ensuring the right personnel are scheduled at the right time.

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text:
All API requests must include an authentication token.

Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN

docs.title: 1. Get All Shifts
docs.text:
GET /api/shifts

Response:

{
  "shifts": [{ "id": 1, "employee": "John Doe", "time": "08:00 - 16:00" }]
}

docs.title: 2. Create a Shift
docs.text:
POST /api/shifts

Request Body:

{
  "employee_id": 123,
  "time": "08:00 - 16:00"
}

docs.title: 3. Update a Shift
docs.text: PUT /api/shifts/{shift_id}

docs.title: 1. System Requirements
docs.text:
• Web Browser: Chrome, Firefox, Edge
  • Mobile App: Android (8.0+), iOS (12+)

docs.title: 2. Installing PangaShift
docs.text:
1. Web App:
  2. Visit https://app.pangashift.com
  3. Sign up for an account
  4. Mobile App:
  5. Download from Google Play Store or Apple App Store
  6. Log in using your registered credentials

docs.title: 3. Setting Up Your Organization
docs.text:
1. Navigate to Admin Panel > Organization Settings
  2. Add employees and define work shifts
  3. Configure notification preferences
  4. Start scheduling shifts!

For troubleshooting, refer to our FAQ or contact support@pangashift.com.

docs.title: Updating Personal Details
docs.text: • Access Settings > Profile to update your name, email, and phone number.

docs.title: Changing Passwords & Security
docs.text:
1. Go to Settings > Security.
  2. Click Change Password and enter a new secure password.

docs.title: Multi-Language Support
docs.text: • Choose English or Swahili from Settings > Language.

docs.title: Adding New Staff
docs.text:
1. Go to Employee Directory.
  2. Click Add Employee and enter details.
  3. Assign roles, departments, and work preferences.

docs.title: Managing Availability
docs.text:
• Employees can set their availability under My Profile > Availability.
  • Managers can override and update schedules if needed.

docs.title: Common Issues & Solutions
docs.text:
• Cannot log in? Reset your password from the login page.
  • Shift swap not working? Ensure the requested employee is available.
  • Need Help? Contact support@pangashift.com for assistance.

docs.title: Contacting Support
docs.text:
• Live Chat: Available in the web app.
  • Email Support: support@pangashift.com
  • Phone: +254 700 000 000

docs.title: 1. How do I reset my password?
docs.text: Go to the login page, click Forgot Password, and follow the instructions.

docs.title: 2. Why am I not receiving shift notifications?
docs.text: Ensure that notifications are enabled in your account settings and that your device allows notifications from the PangaShift app.

docs.title: 3. Can I swap shifts with a colleague?
docs.text: Yes! Use the Shift Swap feature in the mobile app to request a swap.

docs.title: 4. How do I contact support?
docs.text: You can reach our support team at support@pangashift.com or via live chat on our website.

docs.title: Creating an Account & Logging In
docs.text:
1. Visit the PangaShift Web App and click on Sign Up.
  2. Enter your email, name, and password, then verify your account via email.
  3. Log in using your credentials and access your dashboard.

docs.title: Navigating the Dashboard
docs.text:
• The dashboard provides an overview of your upcoming shifts, notifications, and quick actions.
  • Use the side menu to access different sections like shift management, employee directory, and settings.

docs.title: Connecting to HR, Payroll, and EMR Systems
docs.text:
1. Navigate to Settings > Integrations.
  2. Select your HR/payroll system (e.g., QuickBooks, BambooHR).
  3. Authorize PangaShift to sync employee data.

docs.title: Exporting Schedules & Reports
docs.text:
• Click Export Schedule to generate PDF or CSV reports.
  • Automated reports can be scheduled under Settings > Reports.

docs.title: Viewing Your Schedule
docs.text:
1. Click on Schedule from the navigation bar.
  2. View weekly or monthly shifts.
  3. Click on any shift to see details.

docs.title: Requesting Shift Swaps & Time Off
docs.text:
1. Navigate to Shift Management.
  2. Click Request Swap and select an available coworker.
  3. For time off, go to Leave Requests and submit a new request.

docs.title: Approving Shift Requests (For Managers)
docs.text:
1. Go to Shift Requests.
  2. Approve or reject shift swaps and leave requests.
  3. Notifications are sent to employees instantly.

docs.title: Setting Up Notifications
docs.text:
• Enable email, SMS, or in-app notifications from the Settings page.
  • Alerts include shift changes, time-off approvals, and urgent updates.
